SectionBody.Text: There is levied on each license tax imposed under s. 320.08, except those set forth in s. 320.08(11), a surcharge in the amount of $5.50, which shall be collected in the same manner as the license tax. Of the proceeds of each license tax surcharge, $4.50 shall be deposited into the General Revenue Fund and $1 shall be deposited into the Grants and Donations Trust Fund in the Department of Juvenile Justice to fund the juvenile crime prevention programs and the community juvenile justice partnership grants program.
